description: Number of sublattices of index n in generic 4-dimensional lattice.
references: M. Baake, "Solution of coincidence problem...", in R. V. Moody, ed., Math. of Long-Range Aperiodic Order, Kluwer 1997, pp. 9-44.
links: M. Baake and U. Grimm, Combinatorial problems of (quasi)crystallography, arXiv:math-ph/0212015, 2002.
Tad White, Counting Free Abelian Actions, arXiv preprint arXiv:1304.2830 [math.CO], 2013.
Index entries for sequences related to sublattices
formula: f(Q, n) = Sum d*f(Q-1, d), d|n; here Q=4.Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s)*zeta(s-1)*zeta(s-2)*zeta(s-3).Dirichlet convolution of A000578 and A001001.Multiplicative with a(p^e) = product (p^(e+k)-1)/(p^k-1), k=1..3
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, #*DivisorSum[#, #*DivisorSum[#, #&]&]&]; Array[a, 50] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 02 2015, after _Joerg Arndt_ *)
prog: (PARI) a(n)=sumdiv(n,x, x * sumdiv(x,y, y * sumdiv(y,z, z ) ) ); /* _Joerg Arndt_, Oct 07 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 31 2011
